sentence.Network_en: As devotion unites lovers , so perfidy estranges friends.
sentence.Network_cn: 忠诚是爱情的桥梁,欺诈是友谊的敌人.

sentence.Network_en: The knowledge of Hurstwood's perfidy wounded her like a knife.
sentence.Network_cn: 赫斯渥欺骗她的消息像一把刀捅到了她的心里.

sentence.Network_en: Never mind now about Hurstwood's perfidy -- why had he done this?
sentence.Network_cn: 现在先别管赫斯渥的背理悖行 -- 他为什么要这样做?

PerfectNetExp.abs: 博士入学考试词汇 - 博士 ... perennial 永久的 perfidy 背信,不义 perforate 穿孔,凿孔.
求一篇丘吉尔的演讲稿英文_百度知道 ... formalities： 形式，手段，伎俩 perfidy： 背信弃义，背叛 scrupulous： 严格认真的.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... permeate 渗透 perfidy 不忠，背叛 perjury 伪证，假誓.
英语词根词缀记忆大全 ... diffident a 自卑的，胆怯的 perfidy n 不忠实，背叛 perfidious a 背信弃义的.

list.abs: Punic faith ; the perfidious Judas ; the fiercest and most treacherous of foes ; treacherous intrigues ., 背信弃义 ; 背信弃义的犹大 ; 最凶恶 , 最奸诈的敌人 ; 背信弃义的阴谋.
The company was betrayed by its perfidious allies ., 这家公司遭背信弃义的盟友出卖了.
the study of perfidy crime in criminal law of china and other nations ., 中外刑法上的背信犯罪研究.
could not be a product of this perfidious coast ., 是不可能在这种地方出现的.

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent.: via French from Latin perfidia, from perfidus 'treacherous', based on per- 'to ill effect' + fides 'faith'

entry.tran: 背信弃义；背叛；不忠；不仁不义
entry.def: Perfidy is the action of betraying someone or behaving very badly towards someone.

auth_sentence.content: Iranian officials blamed the perfidy of Western sanctions for depriving the country of drugs.
auth_sentence.res_content: Iranian officials blamed the perfidy of Western sanctions for depriving the country of drugs.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Iranian officials blamed the perfidy of Western sanctions for depriving the country of drugs.

auth_sentence.content: For example, the extent and perfidy of the "ethanol" scam is now coming to light.
auth_sentence.res_content: For example, the extent and perfidy of the "ethanol" scam is now coming to light.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: For example, the extent and perfidy of the "ethanol" scam is now coming to light.

auth_sentence.content: It's this kind of insincerity and perfidy that makes people not to believe the whole arrangement.
auth_sentence.res_content: It's this kind of insincerity and perfidy that makes people not to believe the whole arrangement.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It's this kind of insincerity and perfidy that makes people not to believe the whole arrangement.

stems_affixes.type_exp: 1. 表示"贯穿,自始至终;全部"; 2. 表示"假,坏"

stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+enn年+ial的→全年的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+man拿住+ent……的→永久拿住→永恒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+nic毒+ious……的→有毒的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+plex重叠+ed……的→重叠在一起→困惑的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spect看+ive……的→看透了→透视的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spic看+acious多……的→全部看到→独具慧眼

stems_affixes.value_cn: 刚愎自用的,故意作对的
stems_affixes.word_buile: per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vers转+e→一直和别人拧着转
per假,坏+funct作用+ory……的→没起好作用→草率的
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+cuss摇动,敲打+ion表名词→一直敲打
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+oxide氧化物→贯穿的氧化物→过氧化物
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+turb搅→直搅乱→扰乱
per假,坏+fid相信+y状态→假相信→不忠诚
per假,坏+jur发誓+y状态→假发誓;参考:jury陪审团
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+forate打孔→打孔穿过→打洞
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+fuse流→流遍

stems_affixes.value_cn: 弥漫,遍布,散布;渗入,渗透

per贯穿,自始至终;全部+sist站→站到最后→坚持
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+spir呼吸+e→全身呼吸→出汗
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+suade劝→一直劝→劝说
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+use利用→[读书的时候]全部利用→细读
per贯穿,自始至终;全部+vade走→走遍,遍及

per假,坏+vert转→转向坏→堕落
confide[v.吐露[心事],委托,信赖]+ent……的→adj.[of,in]确信的,自信的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 秘[机]密的;表示信任的;担任机密工作的
stems_affixes.word_buile: confident[adj.[of,in]确信的,自信的]+ial……的→相信的人才知道
dif不+fid相信+ent……的→不相信[自己]→自卑的
fid信任,相信,信念+uciary……的→相信的→信托的
in不+fid信任,相信,信念+el→不信宗教的人
perfidy[n.不忠,背叛]+ious……的→perfidious不忠的
af一再+fid信任,相信,信念+avit表名词→一再发誓相信→宣誓书
confide[v.吐露[心事],委托,信赖]+ant人→confidant可以吐露真情的人

de去,不+fy=fid信任→不信任→违抗

in不+fid信任,相信,信念+el→不信宗教的人
